text: This page names the people who ruled Manipur in India. These rules sat on the throne of the Kangla during Ancient Manipur, Medieval Manipur and Modern Manipur, in the Common Era. 3196-3199 ꯃꯙꯨꯆꯟꯗ꯭ꯔ Madhuchandra 1801-1803 3199-3202 ꯆꯧꯔꯖꯤꯠ Chourjit 1803-1813 3202-3212 ꯃꯥꯔꯖꯤꯠ Marjit 1813-1819 3212-3218 ꯍꯦꯔꯥꯆꯟꯗ꯭ꯔ (ꯇꯥꯀꯨ ꯅꯤꯡꯊꯧ) Taku Ningthou (Herachandra) 1819 No Sovereignty period ꯌꯨꯝꯖꯥꯎꯇꯥꯕ Yumjaotaba 1820 ꯒꯝꯚꯤꯔ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ Gambhir Singh 1821 ꯖꯣꯢ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ Jai Singh (Joy Singh) 1822 ꯖꯥꯗꯨ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ (ꯅꯤꯡꯊꯧ ꯆꯤꯡꯂꯦꯟꯈꯣꯝꯕ) Jadu Singh (Ningthou Chinslenkhomba) 1823 ꯔꯥꯘꯚ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ Raghav Singh 1823-1824 ꯚꯗ꯭ꯔ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ (ꯅꯣꯡꯆꯨꯞ ꯂꯝꯉꯥꯢ ꯉꯝꯕ) Bhadra Singh (Nongchup Lamgaingamba) 1824 ꯒꯝꯚꯤꯔ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ (ꯆꯤꯡꯂꯦꯟ ꯅꯣꯡꯗ꯭ꯔꯦꯟꯈꯣꯝꯕ) Gambhir Singh (Chinglen Nongdrenkhomba) (once more) 1825-1834 3224-3232 ꯆꯟꯗ꯭ꯔꯀꯤꯔꯇꯤ (ꯅꯤꯡꯊꯦꯝꯄꯤꯁꯛ) 3248-3284 ꯁꯨꯔꯆꯟꯗ꯭ꯔ Surachandra 1886-1890 3284-3288 ꯀꯨꯂꯆꯟꯗ꯭ꯔ Kulachandra 1890-1891 3288-3289 ꯅꯤꯡꯊꯧ ꯆꯨꯔꯆꯥꯟꯗ ꯁꯤꯡꯍ Sir Churachand Singh 1891-1941 3289-3339 ꯕꯣꯙꯆꯟꯗ꯭ꯔ Bodhchandra 1941-1955 3339-3353 ==Related pages== There are many other ruling dynasties in different parts of Indian than the Imphal Kangla. For example, there are ruling lineages in Moirang province. ==Other websites== * http://e-pao.net/epSubPageExtractor.asp?src=manipur.History_of_Manipur.Kings_of_Manipur * https://themanipurpage.tripod.com/history/meiteikings.html Category:History of Manipur Category:Indian monarchs
title: Rulers of Manipur in Common Era
